explanation: 该研究的标题和摘要主要关注的是产前邻苯二甲酸盐暴露、儿童早期瘦素水平以及DNA甲基化在其中的中介作用。 这属于环境健康和表观遗传学领域，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。研究重点在于化学物质暴露对人体健康的影响机制，而非大气环境的监测或分析。
authors: Zhenxian Jia;Yun Huang;Yiqing Lv;Chengxi Li;Zhiqiang Zhu;Hongxiu Liu;Chenmiao Zhou;Kun Xu;Aifen Zhou;Shunqing Xu;Han Xiao;Yuanyuan Li
title: Prenatal Phthalate Exposure, Leptin in Early Childhood, and Mediating Role of DNA Methylation

explanation: 该论文主要关注的是利用机器学习来优化单原子催化剂介导的高级氧化过程。这是一种化学反应过程，通常用于水处理或工业废气处理等环境工程领域，目的是降解污染物。虽然高级氧化过程可能与大气污染物控制相关，但该论文的核心在于催化剂的优化和机器学习的应用，而不是大气环境遥感技术本身，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。
topic_words: ['Single-Atom Catalyst', 'Advanced Oxidation Processes', 'Machine Learning', 'Global Optimization']
authors: Wenjie Gao;Yongsheng Xu;Xianglin Chang;Xing Xu;Ning Li;Beibei Yan;Guanyi Chen;Xiaoguang Duan
title: Machine Learning-Driven Global Optimization of Single-Atom Catalyst-Mediated Advanced Oxidation Processes

explanation: 该研究主要关注细胞色素P450催化的酚-芳香胺混合物中的代谢交叉偶联反应，通过计算和实验方法相结合进行研究。 这项研究与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。它属于生物化学和酶催化领域，而非大气科学。
authors: Shiyang Cheng;Lingmin Jin;Juchen Ma;Shun Liu;Shubin Zhang;Dong-Xing Guan;Sam P. de Visser;Emma L. Schymanski;Li Ji
title: Discovery of Metabolic Cross-Coupling in Phenol-Arylamine Mixtures by Cytochrome P450 via Combined Computational and Experimental Approaches

explanation: 该研究主要关注的是一种新型的芬顿氧化技术，利用硼掺杂碳材料调控高活性近自由铁(III)，并以过氧化氢作为绿色电子供体，以加速和延长芬顿氧化过程。这项技术主要应用于水处理或其他环境修复领域，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关联。该研究的核心在于材料科学和化学反应，而非大气科学。
authors: Yiming Sun;Chenying Zhou;Shuang Meng;Shuang Zhong;Yang Liu;Chuanshu He;Peng Zhou;Bo Lai
title: Boron-Doped Carbon Material Modulated Highly Reactive Near-Free Fe(III) for Accelerated and Long-Lasting Fenton Oxidation with Hydrogen Peroxide as a Green Electron Donor

explanation: 该论文的标题和摘要主要关注国际贸易中嵌入的塑料流动和碳足迹转移所带来的不公平现象。它探讨了经济活动对环境的影响，特别是塑料污染和碳排放，以及这些影响如何在不同国家之间转移。虽然环境影响是相关的主题，但该论文似乎并不直接涉及大气环境遥感技术，例如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，它与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较低。
authors: Shang Zhang;Jinhui Li;Quanyin Tan
title: Inequities from the Embedded Plastic Flow and Carbon Footprint Transfers in International Trade

explanation: 该研究主要关注多环芳烃（PAHs）暴露对老年人认知功能的影响，并通过脂质组学分析探讨了其中的生物学机制。研究重点在于尿液中多环芳烃的暴露水平与特定性别老年人的认知能力之间的关系，以及脂质代谢在这一过程中的作用。虽然多环芳烃是大气污染物，但该研究更侧重于生物医学和健康领域，而非大气环境遥感技术的应用，例如空气质量监测或卫星观测大气成分分析。
topic_words: ['Polycyclic Aromatic Hydrocarbons', 'PAH Exposure', 'Urinary PAH', 'Lipidomics', 'Cognitive Function', 'Aging', 'Health']
authors: Huimin Ren;Wanying Shi;Xiaojie Guo;Xiao Ma;Jiran Zhang;Yongjun Situ;Chenfeng Li;Chenlong Li;Peijie Sun;Yibo Xu;Kangning Cao;Jiankun Qian;Yifu Lu;Shilu Tong;Xiaoming Shi;Song Tang
title: Sex-Specific Biological Aging-Related Lipidomic Profiles Mediate the Impact of Urinary Polycyclic Aromatic Hydrocarbon Exposures on Cognitive Function in Healthy Older Adults

explanation: 这篇论文主要研究人为因素引起的平均状态变化对太平洋年代际变率（PDV）的影响。论文使用气候模型分析了人为强迫如何驱动太平洋海表温度（SST）的平均状态变化，并探讨了这种变化与太平洋年代涛动（PDO）和北太平洋环流涛动（NPGO）之间的关系。研究表明，在去除趋势后，人为强迫不会改变PDV模式，但在个别集合成员中，由于平均状态趋势无法完全去除，PDO和NPGO的年代际变率会受到人为因素的影响。因此，正确确定平均状态趋势是识别PDV可能受到强迫变化的前提。该研究与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）关联性不大，主要关注气候变化和海洋环流。
topic_words: ['Pacific Decadal Variability', 'Sea Surface Temperature', 'Climate Modeling', 'Anthropogenic Forcing', 'Pacific Decadal Oscillation', 'North Pacific Gyre Oscillation']
authors: C. Xing;S. Stevenson;E. Di Lorenzo;M. Newman;A. Capotondi;J. Fasullo;N. Maher
title: Apparent Changes in Pacific Decadal Variability Caused by Anthropogenically Induced Mean State Modulations
abstract: Pacific decadal variability (PDV), reflected in low‐frequency Pacific sea surface temperature (SST) changes, impacts global climate. Disentangling anthropogenic effects upon PDV is challenging because PDV and anthropogenic forcing vary on similar time scales. Using single‐forcing climate model large ensembles, we find that anthropogenic forcing drives a spatially varying pattern of mean‐state change in Pacific SST that projects onto PDV patterns, principally the Pacific Decadal Oscillation (PDO) and the North Pacific Gyre Oscillation (NPGO). When the trend is removed by subtracting the ensemble mean, there is no forced change of either PDV mode. However, analysis of individual ensemble members, where the mean‐state trend cannot be cleanly removed, yields apparent anthropogenic changes in PDO and NPGO decadal variability. This suggests that observed PDV responses to anthropogenic forcing may be erroneously convolved with the background trend pattern. Therefore, correctly determining the mean‐state trend is a necessary precursor for identifying possible forced changes to PDV.

explanation: 该论文主要研究使用高频无线电信号对雷电进行远距离观测的技术。虽然雷电与大气环境存在一定关联，但该研究的重点在于雷电本身的物理过程和监测，而非大气成分分析、空气质量监测或卫星观测等大气环境遥感技术。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的关联性不强。
topic_words: ['lightning', 'HF radio', 'ionosphere', 'storm monitoring']
authors: Yunjiao Pu;Steven A. Cummer;Yongze Jia
title: Continental‐Scale Lightning Observations at High Frequency
abstract: We initiated high‐frequency (HF, 3–30 MHz) lightning observations to remotely study lightning processes using skywave propagation. HF lightning skywaves were detected at distances up to 3,300 km (potentially farther) during both day and night, with over 64% of events having peak currents below 50 kA. HF measurements revealed distinct temporal features of negative cloud‐to‐ground (CG) leaders, narrow bipolar events, and negative breakdown following positive return strokes. Unlike VLF and LF methods, which primarily capture current pulses along lightning channels, HF observations detect both transient and prolonged leader emissions. This provides more equal sensitivity to both in‐cloud (IC) and CG events, potentially benefiting IC/CG classification and studies of IC‐associated phenomena such as terrestrial gamma‐ray flashes. Ionospheric conditions may influence HF signal propagation but can be mitigated by observing the full HF band. These findings demonstrate the potential of HF observations for advancing lightning physics and storm monitoring over long distances.

explanation: 该研究主要关注过去一个世纪中由大气扰动引起的电离层日间变化的长期趋势。研究发现，地磁长期变化和温室气体增加是导致这些趋势的主要因素。虽然该研究涉及大气，但其重点是电离层，而非大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析），因此与大气环境遥感技术的关联性不强。
topic_words: ['ionosphere', 'geomagnetic secular variation', 'greenhouse gases', 'atmospheric tides', 'ionosonde']
authors: Xu Zhou;Wenbo Li;Huixin Liu;Lianhuan Hu;Yi Li;Xinan Yue
title: Long‐Term Trends of Ionospheric Day‐to‐Day Variability During the Past Century
abstract: In this study, we explore the long‐term trend of ionospheric day‐to‐day variability induced by atmospheric perturbations over the past century, using time‐slice simulations by the whole atmospheric model. The main results show that the magnitude of the trends in the past century maximizes ∼±1% of the seasonal mean per decade. Analysis of the contributing factors reveals that geomagnetic secular variation primarily contributes to the trends over the American‐Atlantic sector, while increasing greenhouse gases (GHG) explain most trend patterns over the Asia‐Pacific region. Additional evidence by Wuhan ionosonde observations covering the period of 1947–2024, supports the simulated negative trend, and the magnitude agrees well with the simulations. Furthermore, our analysis of atmospheric tides revealed that the weakening of SE2 day‐to‐day variability due to increasing GHG levels is a plausible cause. Our findings thus indicate that ionospheric weather‐like variability also undergoes long‐term trends significantly under the climate change scenario.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注2024年4月中国南方发生的破纪录的持续极端降雨事件的可能机制。研究重点在于海面温度（SST）和季节内大气环流的协同效应如何导致这一极端天气事件。具体来说，研究探讨了热带印度洋的SST异常如何加强西太平洋副热带高压，以及10-30天和30-90天的季节内振荡如何分别启动和维持降雨事件。此外，北大西洋的SST异常对北大西洋急流的影响也被研究，以了解其如何通过能量转换促进季节内波列的传播。总的来说，该研究旨在解释极端降雨事件的成因，而非直接涉及大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。
topic_words: ['Sea Surface Temperature', 'Intraseasonal Oscillation', 'Atmospheric Circulation', 'Rainfall', 'Extreme Weather Events']
authors: Wenqi Pan;Jianqi Sun;Jiehua Ma
title: Possible Mechanisms for the Record‐Breaking Persistent Extreme Rainfall Event Over Southern China in April 2024: Synergistic Effects of Multiscale Systems
abstract: In April 2024, southern China suffered a record‐breaking persistent extreme rainfall event (PERE), affecting 1.60 million people and causing direct economic losses of 11.98 billion RMB. This study reveals the synergistic effects of sea surface temperature (SST) and intraseasonal atmospheric circulation. Positive SST anomalies in tropical Indian Ocean (TIO) strengthen the western Pacific subtropical high (WPSH) via Gill‐type response (basical theory describing the atmospheric response to external forces such as tropical SST), enhancing moisture transport to southern China. The 10–30‐day intraseasonal oscillation (ISO) along the subtropical westerly jet initiates the event by inducing a low‐pressure and ascending motion over southern China. The 30–90‐day ISO along the polar front jet sustains the event by intensifying East Asian westerly jet and maintaining ascending motion over southern China. Furthermore, North Atlantic SST anomalies enhance North Atlantic jet stream, promoting downstream propagation of intraseasonal wave trains via energy conversion.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注印度洋偶极子（IOD）对北大西洋-欧洲-地中海地区（NAEM）冬季降水和风暴活动的影响。研究发现IOD会引起类似北大西洋涛动（NAO）的模式，并影响总降水量、降水频率和湿润期长度。此外，IOD还会导致东大西洋和西地中海地区的飓风活动减少。这些变化主要由Eady增长率的变化驱动，而Eady增长率与NAEM地区加强的经向温度梯度有关。该研究旨在提高亚季节到季节预测的准确性。因此，该论文主要关注气候模式和气象现象之间的联系，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。
topic_words: ['Indian Ocean Dipole', 'North Atlantic Oscillation', 'precipitation', 'storm activity', 'cyclone activity', 'Eady Growth Rate', 'sub-seasonal to seasonal prediction']
authors: M. Reale;A. Raganato;F. D'Andrea;M. Adnan Abid;A. Hochman;N. R. Chowdhury;S. Salon;F. Kucharski
title: Response of Early Winter Precipitation and Storm Activity in the North Atlantic–European–Mediterranean Region to Indian Ocean SST Variability
abstract: We investigate the response of winter precipitation and storm activity in the North Atlantic–European–Mediterranean region (NAEM) to the Indian Ocean Dipole (IOD) from 1979 to 2024. We observe a positive NAO‐like pattern over NAEM, which appears in December and shifts eastward through February. IOD further modulates precipitation by inducing changes in total precipitation, event frequency, and wet spell duration. The strength of the observed teleconnection is primarily significant in December. Additionally, we observe a reduction in cyclone activity in December over the East Atlantic and Western Mediterranean. These changes in cyclone track density are primarily driven by variations in the Eady Growth Rate, which are linked to enhanced vertical wind shear associated with a strengthened meridional temperature gradient over the NAEM. The results underscore a significant remote impact of the IOD on early winter hydro‐climate variability over the NAEM region, offering a potential value for improving sub‐seasonal to seasonal prediction.

explanation: 该论文主要研究火星周围的磁通量绳（FRs）及其对重离子逃逸的影响。它利用MAVEN卫星的数据，分析了磁重联（MR）和边界波不稳定性（BWIs）形成的FRs的全球分布，并探讨了这些FRs如何影响火星离子的逃逸。虽然该研究涉及大气成分（离子），但其重点是火星的磁场和空间环境，与地球大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。
topic_words: ['Mars', 'magnetic flux ropes', 'ion escape', 'MAVEN satellite', 'magnetosphere', 'ionosphere']
authors: Jinqiao Fan;Yasong S. Ge;Can Huang;Aimin Du;Xiaohua Fang;Tielong Zhang;Yingjuan Ma;Lei Wang;Ziyong Liu
title: Magnetic Flux Ropes at Mars and Their Impacts on Heavy Ion Escape
abstract: Flux ropes (FRs), ubiquitous helical magnetic structures in solar system plasmas, are important to energy and particle transport. At Mars, where global intrinsic magnetic fields are absent, FRs form through magnetic reconnection (MR) and magnetospheric or ionospheric boundary wave instabilities (BWIs), but their role in ion escape remains controversial. Here, we first present the global distribution of MR‐ and BWI‐FRs from Martian ionosphere to magnetosheath, utilizing 4,012 FR events identified from 5‐year observations by the Mars Atmosphere and Volatile EvolutioN (MAVEN) satellite. We find that the global occurrence rate of FRs associated with BWIs is comparable with those from MR. Enhanced oxygen ion outflow fluxes and densities within most nightside BWI‐FRs suggest they predominantly originate from the dayside ionosphere/magnetosphere. These BWI‐FRs have sufficient magnetic field intensity to carry oxygen ions beyond escape energies, suggesting their potential role in facilitating global ion escape from Mars via magnetotail transport.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注加拿大地区高温和低降水同时发生的频率变化，以及这种现象与大规模气候模式之间的关系。论文分析了1979-2018年间加拿大不同地区（如北极、不列颠哥伦比亚省南部和草原地区）HTLP频率的变化趋势，并探讨了东太平洋-北太平洋型、北大西洋涛动、厄尔尼诺指数和东大西洋型等气候指数对HTLP频率的影响。研究结果旨在解释HTLP的空间动态，并为未来关于热浪和干旱的研究、缓解措施以及针对脆弱地区的政策变化提供有价值的见解。该研究侧重于气候模式分析和极端天气事件，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）的直接关联性较低。
topic_words: ['High Temperature', 'Low Precipitation', 'Climate Patterns', 'Climate Indices', 'Heatwaves', 'Droughts']
authors: Chandra Rupa Rajulapati;Alex Crawford;Simon Michael Papalexiou;Julienne Stroeve
title: Prevailing Climate Patterns for Concurrent High Temperature and Low Precipitation Days in Canada
abstract: In this work, we evaluated the changing frequency of concurrent daily High Temperature and Low Precipitation (HTLP) and its relationship with large‐scale climate patterns across Canada. Our analysis showed a significant increase (up to 3 days/decade) in the Canadian Arctic and southern regions of British Columbia and an insignificant decrease in HTLP frequency in the Prairies of Saskatchewan and Manitoba during 1979–2018. We examined ten large‐scale climate patterns influencing precipitation and temperature in Canada. Among these, four climate indices (the East Pacific‐North Pacific Pattern, North Atlantic Oscillation, Oceanic Niño Index, and East Atlantic Pattern) were noted as significant influencers of HTLP frequency, ranked in descending order of influence. Our research holds significance in explaining the spatial dynamics of HTLP days and the role of large‐scale climate patterns therein, providing valuable insights for future research on heatwaves and droughts, mitigation efforts, and policy changes tailored to vulnerable regions.

explanation: 该研究论文主要探讨了印度洋偶极子（IOD）对阿拉伯半岛夏季气候的影响，重点分析了正负IOD事件如何不对称地影响该地区的气温和降水模式。研究揭示了IOD通过调节哈德莱环流和南亚高压，进而影响阿拉伯半岛的环流和温度分布，并解释了负IOD事件产生更强气候异常的原因，包括非线性平流和云辐射反馈等因素。虽然该研究与大气环境有关，但它侧重于气候动力学和区域气候变化，而非直接涉及大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。
topic_words: ['Indian Ocean Dipole', 'Climate Modeling', 'Regional Climate', 'Hadley Circulation', 'Precipitation Patterns', 'Temperature Anomalies']
authors: Yiling Zheng;Ibrahim Hoteit
title: Asymmetric Impacts of Indian Ocean Dipole on Summer Climate Over Arabian Peninsula
abstract: While the Indian Ocean Dipole (IOD) influences the Arabian Peninsula (AP) summer climate, the underlying mechanisms remain unclear. Here, we show the IOD's impact is asymmetric, with negative IOD events driving stronger, opposite climate anomalies to positive IOD events. Positive IOD modulates the local Hadley circulation and the South Asian High, establishing a lower‐level anticyclone over the AP. This anomalous circulation drives a dipole surface air temperature pattern (warmer south, slightly cooler north) via altered horizontal advection. It also suppresses southwestern AP precipitation through weakened ascent and reduced moisture influx. The stronger negative IOD response is attributed to distinct factors: for temperature, nonlinear advection and enhanced cloud‐radiation feedback; for precipitation, a “floor effect” from low mean‐state precipitation limits further drying during positive IOD. Clarifying these mechanisms provides a new framework for understanding and predicting climate in this vulnerable region.

explanation: 该论文主要研究印度洋偶极子（IOD）的预测，利用深度学习方法分析海面温度和高度异常，并发现了新的IOD前兆因子。虽然该研究与气候变化有关，但它侧重于海洋现象及其对全球气候的影响，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关联。
topic_words: ['Sea Surface Temperature Anomalies (SSTA)', 'Sea Surface Height Anomalies (SSHA)', 'Indian Ocean Dipole (IOD)', 'ENSO', 'Climate Forecasting']
authors: Haoyu Wang;Jing Wang;Xiaofeng Li
title: Deep Learning Reveals ENSO's Footprint on the Indian Ocean Dipole: Insights From the Eastern Pacific (American) Coast
abstract: The Indian Ocean Dipole (IOD) significantly influences global climate and ecosystem dynamics, yet accurate forecasting remains challenging due to its complex nature. Here, we present an interpretable deep‐learning framework, STPNet, that achieves the‐state‐of‐the‐art 8‐month forecasting of fall IOD events by leveraging sea surface temperature anomalies (SSTA) and sea surface height anomalies (SSHA) from CMIP6 data. Through STPNet's interpretability features and targeted sensitivity experiments, we not only confirmed previously known IOD precursors but also identified a novel precursor along the eastern Pacific (American) Coast. Subsequent lagged regression analysis revealed this precursor's connection to ENSO‐mediated coupling between extratropical and subtropical Pacific SST patterns, completing the global map of IOD precursors. Our findings substantially advance the understanding of IOD mechanisms and provide a robust framework for operational forecasting, with direct implications for global climate adaptation strategies.

explanation: 该论文主要研究了基于雷达数据同化的对流尺度预报系统的实际可预测性限制。论文探讨了即使使用最先进的系统和频繁的数据同化，由于缺乏直接测量和现有信息利用的局限性，在预测雷暴的完整生命周期方面仍然存在显著的不确定性。论文结论表明，除非在新的测量技术或创新思想上进行大规模投资，否则雷暴预报的准确性将难以显著提高，从而限制了威胁预报的价值。该研究主要关注数值天气预报和数据同化技术，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）的关联性不强。
topic_words: ['thunderstorm forecasting', 'radar data assimilation', 'forecast uncertainty', 'convective-scale prediction', 'data assimilation systems']
authors: Jagdeep Singh Sodhi;Frédéric Fabry
title: Limits to the Practical Predictability of Convective‐Scale Forecast Systems With World‐Class Data Assimilation
abstract: The uncertainty of the analysis and the error growth of the forecast from two of the best prediction systems based on radar data assimilation are studied to determine how close we are from accurately forecasting thunderstorms and what additional information would be required to achieve this goal. Even if these two state‐of‐the‐art systems frequently assimilate all available measurements for one, or assimilate radar data every 30 s for the other, considerable uncertainty remains in unobserved atmospheric properties such as temperature or humidity. Worse, limited improvement can be expected as limited direct measurements exist, and essentially all the covariance‐based information is being exploited. Unless a massive investment in new measurement technologies occurs, or radically new ideas are proposed, forecast accuracy will remain insufficient to properly simulate the complete lifetime of a thunderstorm, limiting the accuracy and value of threat forecasting.

explanation: 该论文主要关注的是野火蔓延和强度随气候和社会经济变化而发生的变化，以及如何利用全球气候观测系统（GCOS）的基本气候变量（ECVs）和卫星观测数据来支持野火适应。论文识别了影响野火风险的关键变量，并评估了这些变量与GCOS ECVs的关联性，以及卫星对这些变量的监测情况。虽然论文提到了卫星观测，但其重点在于野火风险评估和适应，而非大气环境遥感技术的具体应用，如空气质量监测或大气成分分析。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较弱。
topic_words: ['wildfire extent', 'wildfire intensity', 'GCOS Essential Climate Variables (ECVs)', 'satellite observations', 'fire danger', 'exposure', 'social vulnerability', 'ecosystem vulnerability']
authors: S.P. Seitzinger;E. Chuvieco;F. Di Giuseppe;A. Bombelli;C. Cagnazzo;S. Harris;N. Tapper
title: Relevance of earth observations of essential climate variables in wildfire adaptation
abstract:
•Wildfire extent and intensity are shifting with climate and land use change. •Data from local to global scales are critical for wildfire adaptation. •Review identifies 30 key variables across five wildfire risk components. •25 of these are covered by GCOS ECVs, 20 monitored by satellites globally. •Major gaps remain for specific spatial and temporal requirements. 
 Wildfire extent and intensity are changing globally, driven by climate and socio-economic changes. Data across local to global scales are needed to support wildfire adaptation, yet comprehensive analysis of the main variables controlling multiple dimensions of wildfire risk including availability of global data for those variables is lacking. This review examines key variables influencing wildfire risk including fire danger (ignition and propagation), exposure and social and ecosystem vulnerability - the latter two often missing from fire risk analyses. We propose spatial and temporal requirements for these variables, a major gap in the literature, to support adaptation to future conditions. We assess which variables are monitored by national observation networks and evaluate the extent to which the Global Climate Observing System (GCOS) Essential Climate Variables (ECVs), traditionally used for climate system modeling, meet wildfire adaptation needs.We identified 30 key wildfire risk variables, 25 of which are represented by GCOS ECV products within 18 ECVs. Cross-product analysis showed most are relevant to multiple wildfire risk components (ignition, propagation, exposure, societal and ecological vulnerability) and that many relevant to fire danger (ignition and propagation) also inform exposure and vulnerability. Currently, 20 key variables are operationally monitored by space agency satellites, with global coverage at estimated temporal and/or spatial resolution available for at least half of variables in each risk component, except exposure. Future research directions and global observation needs to strengthen wildfire adaptation challenges are identified. This work supports UNFCCC and Paris Agreement calls to identify observations needs for climate adaptation.

explanation: 该论文主要研究利用中等光谱分辨率遥感影像获取的太阳诱导叶绿素荧光（SIF）来检测植物在胁迫下的生理变化。研究重点在于评估不同的SIF反演技术，如Fraunhofer线深度法（FLD）和光谱拟合法（SFM），在理论模拟、受控实验和野外试验中的表现。论文发现SFM方法能够较好地捕捉到胁迫引起的植物生理变化，并生成清晰的SIF地图。因此，该研究主要关注植物生理遥感，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关联。
topic_words: ['plant physiology', 'sun-induced chlorophyll fluorescence', 'remote sensing', 'plant stress detection', 'mid-spectral resolution imagery']
authors: Wonseok Choi;Youngryel Ryu;Hyungsuk Kimm;Anirudh Belwalkar;Tomas Poblete;Insu Yeon;Jae-Hyun Ryu;Kyung-Do Lee;Pablo J. Zarco-Tejada
title: Detecting plant physiological changes under stress using sun-induced chlorophyll fluorescence from mid-spectral resolution imagery
abstract:
•Evaluation of SIFMSretrieval via simulation, control experiment and field campaigns. •SFM method provided approximate SIFMSand ΦFMSwith the clear spatial patterns. •3FLD SIFMSwas sensitive to detector non-uniformity and band choice. 
 Sun-induced chlorophyll fluorescence (SIF) serves as a valuable indicator for remote sensing of plant physiology. Recent studies have shown that far-red SIF at 761 nm (hereafter SIF) from mid spectral resolution (SR) imagers (3–7 nm full width half maximum (FWHM)) derived reliable fluorescence emission in relative levels. Such mid SR based SIF (SIFMS; the subscript MS refers to mid SR basis) has been extensively utilized for assessing fluorescence variability in precision agriculture and plant stress detection across various platforms. However, the uncertainties regarding the ability of SIFMS to detect physiological SIF yield (ΦF) remain inadequately investigated. Here, we evaluated various retrieval techniques (i.e., Fraunhofer line depth (FLD), its variant methods, and spectral fitting method (SFM)) under theoretical condition (SCOPE simulation), stress condition (DCMU experiment at field level and rice brown spot disease detection at drone level), and at airborne level employing mid SR (3–7 nm FWHM) and sub-nanometer SR (< 0.2 nm FWHM) sensors. Under theoretical conditions, the SIFMS derived from aFLD, 3FLD and SFM showed strong linear relationships with the simulated fluorescence at 761 nm (R2 > 0.9; RMSE <0.5 mW m−2 nm−1 sr−1). With data collected under stress conditions, however, only the SFM method captured the stress-induced physiological changes in the field-ΦFMS (p-value <0.05) and from the drone-ΦFMS (p-value <0.05; R2 = 0.51). SFM also produced a robust and clear map of airborne-SIFMS (SIFMS = 1.03 x SIFSN + 0.48 where the subscript SN refers to sub-nanometer SR). Conversely, 3FLD and aFLD methods yielded a limited ability to adequately detect the physiological changes in field-ΦFMS (p-value>0.05) and drone-ΦFMS (p-value <0.05; R2 ≤ 0.15) and exhibited a noticeable stripe noise in the airborne-SIFMS map. Our finding demonstrated that mid SR imagery with SFM has the potential to track crop ΦF changes induced by stresses.

explanation: 该论文主要关注遥感图像压缩技术，特别是针对NASA/USGS Landsat Next任务的数据压缩策略。虽然Landsat数据可以用于大气环境遥感，但该论文本身的核心在于图像处理和数据压缩算法的优化，而不是直接研究大气成分、空气质量或特定大气现象。因此，与大气环境遥感技术的直接关联性较弱。
topic_words: ['Image compression', 'Remote sensing', 'Landsat Next', 'Data processing']
authors: Rehman S. Eon;Craig De Groot;Jeffrey A. Pedelty;Aaron Gerace;Matthew Montanaro;Richard K. Covington;Amy S. DeLisa;Wen-Ting Hsieh;Joy M. Henegar-leon;Douglas J. Daniels;Christopher Engebretson;Christopher J. Crawford;Thomas R.H. Holmes;Philip Dabney;Bruce D. Cook
title: Corrigendum to Toward a near-lossless image compression strategy for the NASA/USGS Landsat Next mission Remote Sensing of Environment Volume 329, 1 November 2025, 114929

explanation: 由于只提供了标题“编委会”和摘要“摘要”，没有足够的信息来判断该研究论文是否与大气环境遥感技术相关。编委会通常与期刊或出版物的管理相关，而“摘要”本身不提供任何关于研究主题的信息。因此，无法确定其与空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析等大气环境遥感技术的关联性。
title: Editorial Board

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文主要关注的是使用InVEST模型和地理加权回归（GTWR）模型来研究中国山区氮（N）和磷（P）输出的驱动因素，并分析这些驱动因素如何随尺度变化。它主要涉及地理信息科学、生态系统服务建模以及水质研究，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）关系不大。
authors: Zhiqiang Lin;Shuangyun Peng;Yuanyuan Yin;Dongling Ma;Rong Jin;Jiaying Zhu;Ziyi Zhu;Shuangfu Shi;Yilin Zhu
title: Corrigendum to “Coupled InVEST-GTWR modeling reveals scale-dependent drivers of N and P export in a Chinese mountainous region” [Int. J. Appl. Earth Obs. Geoinf. 142 (2025) 104705]

explanation: 该研究使用化学箱模型模拟了墨西哥城大都会区（MCMA）在严重臭氧污染事件中的臭氧（O3）生成情况，并探讨了挥发性有机物（VOCs）和氮氧化物（NOx）排放变化对臭氧生成的影响。研究结合了臭氧生成速率等值线、光化学指标以及卫星观测数据（HCHO/NO2比率）来评估臭氧敏感性，发现该地区属于VOC限制型区域。研究结果表明，控制交通排放相关的VOCs对于降低当地臭氧生成至关重要。因此，该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，特别是空气质量监测、卫星观测以及大气成分分析等方面。
topic_words: ['Ozone', 'VOC', 'NOx', 'Photochemical indicators', 'Satellite observations (HCHO/NO2 ratio)', 'Air quality monitoring', 'Atmospheric composition analysis', 'Emission control']
authors: Tanzina Akther;Bernhard Rappenglueck;Irfan Karim;Beth S. Nelson;Alfred W. Mayhew;Armando Retama;Olivia Rivera-Hernández
title: Box-modeling of O<sub>3</sub> and its sensitivity towards VOCs and NO<sub>x</sub> in Mexico city under altered emission conditions
abstract:
•Mexico City shows VOC-limited ozone regime using P(O3) isopleth. •P(O3) is lower compared to previous years. •Combined application of P(O3), PIs, and FNR to assess O3sensitivity. •Phased based emission control needed for traffic exhaust related VOCs. 
 A zero-dimensional chemical box model was used to study O3 production P(O3) in the Mexico City Metropolitan Area (MCMA) during a severe O3 episode. The study revealed that this area in MCMA falls into a VOC-limited regime. Different photochemical indicator (PI) ratios offer additional supporting perspectives on NOx sensitive and VOC-sensitive conditions. We found VOC/NOx ratio <8 throughout the day which was supported by noontime satellite retrieved HCHO/NO2 ratio (FNR) < 1 for the O3 episode suggesting a VOC limited regime. VOCs and OH reactivity levels are approximately half that of measurements reported in 2003. The modelled peak OH (0.25 pptv), HO2 (12pptv) and P(O3) (17 ppb h−1) are 0.5, 4.5 and 6.5 times lower than reported for the MCMA in 2003. Model adjustment to 4.5 times HO2 leads to P(O3) half that of the previously calculated P(O3) in 2003 and 25 % of the value reported for 2015–2019 in MCMA. Therefore, for effective O3 abatement policies, it is crucial to use a combination of P(O3) isopleths alongside PIs and FNRs. An analysis of Propylene-Equivalent (Propy-Equiv) concentrations revealed that ethylene, m,p-xylene, traffic exhaust related isoprene, toluene, m,p-xylene, propylene and propane which account for 62.6 % of the overall Propy-Equiv need to be controlled in the time frame before 14:00 when P(O3) is elevated. These VOCs are mainly associated with vehicle exhaust and evaporative emissions. Compared to previous liquified petroleum gases (LPG) reduction, it is suggested that reductions of these traffic emissions prior to 14:00 might be an essential step in lowering in-situ O3 production.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注利用新型光谱激光雷达技术（LITES）对英国上空的撒哈拉沙尘暴进行表征。通过532纳米激光雷达的光学特性、粒子退偏振比以及光谱分析，确认了沙尘的存在，并实现了在低沙尘载荷下的气溶胶类型识别。研究结果表明，光谱激光雷达在气溶胶监测方面优于传统激光雷达，并为大气环境遥感技术，特别是空气质量监测和大气成分分析提供了有价值的信息。
topic_words: ['Saharan dust', 'Lidar', 'Aerosol typing', 'Atmospheric composition', 'Aerosol optical depth', 'Spectroscopic lidar', 'Particle depolarization', 'Air quality monitoring']
authors: Avinash C. Yadav;Boyan Tatarov;Rui Song;Adrian Ghita;Detlef Müller
title: Characterizing the Saharan dust transported to the UK through lidar ratio, particle depolarization, and spectroscopic measurements
abstract:
•First UK study combining 532 nm lidar with spectral analysis of Saharan dust. •Lidar and depolarization ratios at 532 nm confirm the presence of Saharan dust. •Spectral signatures improved aerosol typing even at low dust loading (AOD = 0.19–0.26). •Results show advantages of spectroscopic lidars over traditional lidars. 
 On 1 May 2024, a Saharan dust plume was observed over Hatfield, UK, and analyzed using a novel spectroscopic lidar system (LITES) developed at the University of Hertfordshire. To the best of our knowledge, this represents the first coordinated study over the UK combining lidar optical properties at 532 nm with a spectrally resolved analysis of a long-range transported Saharan dust event. A distinct dust layer was observed between 2–5 km, with lidar-derived optical thickness values ranging from 0.19 to 0.26 at 532 nm, indicating a low-to-moderate Saharan dust intrusion. Within this layer, the lidar ratio was 53 ± 14 sr and the particle linear depolarization ratio was 0.27 ± 0.02, confirming the presence of non-spherical dust particles. After 4 h, despite the reduction in dust loading, the lidar ratios (mean: 51 ± 11 sr) and particle linear depolarization ratios (0.28 ± 0.01) remained characteristic of Saharan dust. Complementary AERONET observations, collected approximately 10 km from the lidar site, recorded low Å ngström exponent values (0.05–0.2 at 440–870 nm) and a high total AOD of 0.5, with coarse-mode AOD contributing 0.37 (74%) at 500 nm, further confirming the dominance of coarse-mode Saharan dust. Spectrally resolved lidar signals revealed distinct Raman-shifted features near 571.0 nm ± 1.3 nm (1284 ± 40 cm−1) and higher backscatter signals in the 542.9–554.4 nm (377-759 cm−1) range, using a primary emission wavelength of 532 nm. These spectral features persisted throughout the dust layer but were absent in the Raman spectrum of a low-level cloud that was embedded in the dust layer during the lidar observation time. These dust spectral features furthermore disappeared above the dust layer, confirming their attribution to Saharan dust. The spectrally resolved observations are consistent with the Raman spectra of dust samples, which were measured in the LITES laboratory using Raman spectroscopy for direct comparison.

explanation: 该研究论文的标题和摘要表明，它与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。该研究提出了一种新的基于Sentinel-2卫星观测的甲烷排放监测方法，特别针对油气行业。该方法旨在解决传统卫星方法在复杂地形和大气干扰下的局限性，通过改进的算法（MBMR）来提高甲烷羽流检测的准确性。研究通过受控实验和实际泄漏案例验证了该方法的有效性，表明其能够识别和量化油气设施和管道中的甲烷泄漏。该研究对于提高大气环境监测能力，特别是针对温室气体排放的监测具有重要意义。
topic_words: ['methane emissions', 'satellite observations', 'Sentinel-2', 'plume detection', 'oil and gas sector', 'air quality monitoring', 'atmospheric composition analysis']
authors: B.A. Zambrano-Luna;Liubov Sysoeva;Shan Gao;Russell Milne;Zvonko Burkus;Hao Wang
title: Improved monitoring of methane emissions for the oil and gas sector with Sentinel-2 satellite observations
abstract:
•We introduce a satellite plume detection method, Median-Based Multi-Reference (MBMR). •MBMR’s design accounts for complex landscapes and local atmospheric interference. •We test MBMR on controlled methane-release experiments and real-world leak cases. •MBMR identifies and quantifies methane leaks at oil and gas facilities and pipelines. •Industry and regulatory bodies can benefit from MBMR’s greater monitoring capability. 
 Accurate and timely monitoring of methane emissions is essential for mitigating the impacts of greenhouse gases, particularly in remote regions lacking on-land sensors. Traditional satellite-based methods for detecting methane often encounter challenges due to coarse spatial resolutions and spectral interferences, especially in areas with mixed land use and numerous inland water bodies. One example is the Sentinel-5P satellite, which is extensively utilized for monitoring air quality and global greenhouse gas concentrations. Our study identified significant gaps in the coverage of Sentinel-5P imagery in the Athabasca Oil Sands Region, home to the world’s third largest oil reserve, highlighting the need for enhanced monitoring solutions. To address these limitations, we introduce the Median-Based Multi-Reference (MBMR) algorithm for methane retrieval, designed for Sentinel-2’s shortwave infrared (SWIR) imagery. The MBMR algorithm takes into account surface albedo variability, local greenhouse gas concentrations, and improved reference scene selection to enhance the accuracy of plume detection. Performance evaluations using simulated methane plume datasets and controlled methane release experiments demonstrate that MBMR outperforms both baseline methods and existing state-of-the-art algorithms. When applied to actual methane leaks from the NGTL pipeline system and Syncrude’s bitumen upgrader in the Athabasca Oil Sands Region, MBMR showcased its robust capability to identify methane plumes amidst complex landscapes and diverse emissions scenarios. The successful integration of MBMR with Sentinel-2 imagery, which is primarily used for land cover mapping, vegetation and water indexing, harvesting planning, and disaster response, highlights its potential as a reliable and cost-effective tool for continuous monitoring of methane emissions in challenging environments.

explanation: 由于只提供了标题“编委会”和摘要“摘要”，没有关于研究内容的信息，因此无法判断该论文是否与大气环境遥感技术相关。无法提取任何主题词，也无法对论文内容进行解释。
title: Editorial Board

explanation: 该研究论文探讨了中国主要城市群在热浪期间，气象条件和物理化学过程如何加剧臭氧污染。虽然论文没有直接提及遥感技术，但它使用了GEOS-Chem模拟，这是一种可以结合卫星观测数据的化学传输模型。此外，研究关注的臭氧是大气环境遥感的重要组成部分，例如通过卫星观测进行空气质量监测和大气成分分析。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术有较强的关联性，尤其是在空气质量监测和大气成分分析方面。
topic_words: ['ozone pollution', 'heatwaves', 'GEOS-Chem simulations', 'atmospheric composition', 'air quality monitoring']
authors: Yu Song;Pinya Wang;Yang Yang;Jianping Tang;Hong Liao
title: Meteorological conditions and physicochemical processes amplifying ozone pollution during heatwaves in major city clusters of China
abstract:
•Elevated ozone levels are observed in the four major city clusters of China during HW days. •HWs feature high-pressure, anticyclonic circulation, subsidence, less cloud, stronger radiation, and surface warming. •Chemical production dominates ozone rise; transport boosts ozone in BTH but reduces it in YRD, SCB, and PRD regions. 
 Climate warming has led to a rising frequency of extreme heat events over China, which further exacerbate surface ozone (O₃) pollution alongside accelerating anthropogenic emissions, especially for the key city clusters, i.e., Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei (BTH), Yangtze River Delta (YRD), Sichuan Basin (SCB), and Pearl River Delta (PRD). With long-term observations, reanalysis, and GEOS-Chem simulations, this study reveals significant enhancements ozone levels during heatwave days (HWs) compared to non-heatwave days (NHWs), driven by distinct yet interconnected meteorological and physicochemical processes across different city clusters. In BTH, a persistent 500 hPa high-pressure system, together with reduced relative humidity, enhanced downward solar radiation at the surface, and 850 hPa southerly winds, leads to elevated temperatures and consequently higher O₃ concentrations during HWs compared with NHWs. The YRD experiences intensified subsidence and suppressed cloud cover under the northward shifted Western Pacific Subtropical High (WPSH), creating ideal conditions for photochemistry. Similarly, SCB and PRD, in the dominance of the northwestward extension of WPSH and associated subsidence, features increased SSRD and surface air temperatures. Moreover, tropical cyclones over Northwest Pacific may affect O3 anomalies in PRD. Process analysis demonstrates that chemical production dominates O₃ enhancement across all regions. Horizontal transport shows a positive contribution in BTH but significant negative contributions in the other three regions. In contrast, vertical transport and mixing processes exhibit relatively weak impacts. The findings can provide theoretical support to tackle ozone pollution for major city clusters in China amid the increasing frequency of extreme heat events.

explanation: 该研究论文的标题和摘要主要关注的是砷污染地下水的商品化，以及从中提取关键原材料的问题。这与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析，没有直接关系。该研究似乎侧重于水文地质学、材料科学和环境工程领域，而非大气科学。
authors: Kaifeng Wang and Case M. van Genuchten
title: Commodifying a carcinogen: Critical raw materials from arsenic-laden groundwater

explanation: 该研究的标题和摘要主要关注束状藻胆蛋白体的结构和猝灭现象。藻胆蛋白体是一种光合色素蛋白复合物，主要存在于蓝藻和红藻中，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。该研究更偏向于生物化学、生物物理学或植物生理学领域。
authors: Anna D. Burtseva;Yury B. Slonimskiy;Timur N. Baymukhametov;Maria A. Sinetova;Daniil A. Gvozdev;Georgy V. Tsoraev;Dmitry A. Cherepanov;Eugene G. Maksimov;Vladimir O. Popov;Konstantin M. Boyko;Nikolai N. Sluchanko

authors: Bingwei Bao;Yingying Hao;Xilu Wu;Ru Xiao;Chengyi Hou;Yaogang Li;Qinghong Zhang;Kerui Li;Hongzhi Wang

title: Lightweight and ultrastrong 3D nanoarchitected high-entropy ceramic metamaterials

explanation: 该研究论文的标题和摘要表明，它关注的是超过温度目标后，空气污染造成的损害。这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它需要使用空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析等技术来评估和量化空气污染的程度及其对环境和人类健康的影响。该研究旨在评估气候变化背景下，未能实现既定温度目标所带来的空气污染损害。

title: Beyond the limit: The estimated air pollution damages of overshooting the temperature target

authors: Lap Kwan Chan;Juanjuan Shan;Elias Rodriguez-Fos;Marc Eamonn Healy;Peter Leary;Rossella Parrotta;Nina Desboeufs;Gabriel Semere;Nadine Wittstruck;Anton G. Henssen;Achim Weber
title: Extrachromosomal circular DNA promotes inflammation and hepatocellular carcinoma development

explanation: 该研究的标题和摘要主要关注生命早期细菌群落与呼吸道免疫的协同发展，以及菌群失调与全身单核细胞特征和喘息之间的联系。它探讨了微生物组、免疫系统和呼吸道健康之间的关系。因此，该研究与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。该研究属于生物医学领域，而非大气科学或遥感领域。
authors: Céline Pattaroni;Matthew Macowan;Roxanne Chatzis;Giulia Iacono;Bailey Cardwell;Mindy Gore;Adnan Custovic;Michael D. Shields;Ultan F. Power;Jonathan Grigg;Graham Roberts;Peter Ghazal;Jürgen Schwarze;Steve Turner;Andrew Bush;Sejal Saglani;Clare M. Lloyd;Benjamin J. Marsland
title: Bacterial communities co-develop with respiratory immunity early in life, linking dysbiosis to systemic monocyte signature and wheezing

explanation: 该论文的标题和摘要主要关注神经科学领域，特别是大脑皮层在冲动控制中的作用。它探讨了等待期间冲动控制的不同皮层机制。与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术领域无关。
authors: Malcolm Ho Zheng Hao and Tsukasa Kamigaki
title: Dissociable cortical contributions to impulse control during waiting

explanation: 这篇论文的标题和摘要主要关注细胞生物学领域，特别是驱动蛋白-1在树突状细胞迁移过程中微管和肌动蛋白细胞骨架之间相互作用的协调作用。它与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。该研究似乎集中在细胞水平的生物过程，而不是大气环境的遥感应用。
authors: Pierre Duquesne;Céline Aoun;Mathieu Kurowska;Brieuc P. Perot;Kerui Zhang;Mounia Debili;Mirjana Weimershaus;François-Xavier Mauvais;Nicolas Cagnard;Nicolas Goudin;Bernardita Medel;Juan Eduardo Montero-Hermández;Linda Diedhiou;Jian-Dong Huang;Alain Fischer;Geneviève de Saint Basile;Mickaël M. Ménager;Pablo Vargas;Fernando E. Sepulveda;Gaël Ménasché
title: Kinesin-1 coordinates cross-talk between microtubule and actin cytoskeletons during dendritic cell migration

explanation: 该研究的标题和摘要主要关注生物医学领域，具体是AIBP-LRP2介导的HDL摄取如何限制CXCR4+干细胞样毛细血管扩张和侧支循环。 这与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。该研究似乎主要集中在血管生物学和细胞信号传导机制上。
authors: Lingping Zhu;Minghong Chen;Kechuan Lin;Can Du;Meilian Yao;Jing Chen;Jian Zhang;Xunjie Cheng;Dan Wang;Yu Liu;Lisha Liu;Junyu Chen;Yamei Liu;Xin Luo;Guogang Zhang;Chuanchang Li;Longhou Fang;Yongping Bai
title: AIBP-LRP2–mediated HDL uptake restricts CXCR4+ stemlike capillary expansion and collateral circulation

explanation:
该研究论文的标题和摘要主要关注非小细胞肺癌（NSCLC）的治疗和耐药性问题，特别是针对RRM2靶点的双模式治疗诊断纳米响应器以及免疫重塑。它与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析等，没有直接或明显的关联。

具体来说，该研究旨在克服奥希替尼（Osimertinib）的耐药性，这是一种常用于治疗NSCLC的药物。研究重点在于开发一种新型的纳米技术手段，通过靶向RRM2来达到治疗和诊断的目的，并探讨其对免疫系统的影响。因此，其核心是生物医学和药物研发领域，而非大气环境科学。
authors: Jinyu Zhu;Kaihui Cui;Wenyuan Zhou;Xin Zhou;Yuan Yao;Chuanke Zhao;Yuwen Yang;Yang Liu;Jinping Tao;Zhi Yang;Hua Zhu;Bufu Tang;Nan Li
title: Targeting RRM2 with dual-modal theranostic smart nanoresponder overcomes osimertinib resistance and triggers immune remodeling in NSCLC

explanation: 该研究的标题和摘要表明，它主要关注马达加斯加的地貌演变，特别是与两个地堑相关的地质过程。这与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术领域的相关性较低，主要属于地质学和地貌学的研究范畴。
authors: Romano Clementucci;Egor Uchusov;Yanyan Wang;Sean D. Willett
title: Madagascar’s landscape evolution: A tale of two rifts

explanation: 该研究的标题和摘要表明，它主要关注青藏高原及其周边地区人群的短串联重复序列（STRs），旨在通过遗传学角度研究高海拔适应性。 这项研究属于遗传学和人类学领域，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。因此，它与大气环境遥感技术关联不大。
authors: Yuguo Huang;Mengge Wang;Zhiyong Wang;Xiaojun Liu;Yuhang Feng;Jie Zhong;Hailin Huang;Jia Geng;Ting Tang;Chao Liu;Yu Lu;Jing Cheng;Fengxiao Bu;Guanglin He;Huijun Yuan
title: Short tandem repeats in populations of the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau and adjacent regions provide insights into high-altitude adaptation

explanation: 该论文主要关注气候变暖背景下中低纬度海洋的绿度下降和浮游植物繁殖现象。虽然使用了遥感卫星观测数据，但其核心是海洋生态学和气候变化的影响，而非大气环境遥感技术，例如空气质量监测或大气成分分析。因此，与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较弱。
topic_words: ['ocean color', 'phytoplankton', 'climate change', 'remote sensing (ocean)', 'satellite observations (ocean)']
authors: Zhongkun Hong;Di Long;Kaiyue Shan;Jian-Min Zhang;R. Iestyn Woolway;Maofeng Liu;Michael E. Mann;Hongwei Fang
title: Declining ocean greenness and phytoplankton blooms in low to mid-latitudes under a warming climate

explanation: 该论文的标题和摘要主要关注的是嗜热栖热菌（Thermus thermophilus）中旋转式ATP合酶在质子驱动ATP合成过程中的结构。这属于分子生物学和生物化学领域，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术不相关。
authors: Atsuki Nakano;Jun-ichi Kishikawa;Nishida Yui;Kyosuke Sugawara;Yuto Kan;Christoph Gerle;Hideki Shigematsu;Kaoru Mitsuoka;Ken Yokoyama
title: Structures of rotary ATP synthase from Thermus thermophilus during proton powered ATP synthesis

explanation: 该论文主要研究基于氧化物半导体的透明UVA光电探测器，用于实时可穿戴皮肤保护监测。 这项研究的重点是开发用于个人皮肤保护的设备，而不是大气环境遥感技术。 因此，它与空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析等大气环境遥感技术没有直接关系。
authors: Yu Bin Kim;Hyoun Ji Ha;Jung Min Yun;Min Jung Choi;Kyusun Han;Seunghwan Kim;Soohyung Park;Minsu Park;Hongseok Oh;Jae-Young Yoo;Seong Jun Kang
title: Transparent UVA photodetectors based on oxide semiconductors for real-time wearable skin protection monitoring

explanation: 该论文的标题和摘要主要关注的是一种集成了液晶弹性体（LCE）的软皮肤，用于制造毫米级的可转向软体翻转机器人。这属于机器人学、材料科学和微型设备制造的范畴。它与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析，没有直接的关联。
authors: Sukjun Kim;Gaoweiang Dong;Aedan Mangan;Devyansh Agrawal;Shengqiang Cai;Tania K. Morimoto
title: LCE-integrated soft skin for millimeter-scale steerable soft everting robots
